Quality Education.reason: 課程目標與學習成效強調跨領域協作與實作學習，符合Quality Education。
evidence: This course is interdisciplinary, covering the mathematical foundations of social network analysis (SNA), including SNA data collection and data analysis processes.
Students can practice various SNA methods using appropriate technologies, such as UCINET and R.
Students can participate in various learning activities and conduct group projects with other students from different fields.
